channel.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
channel.description:
https://prommote.me/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/world-of-warcraft-battle-for-azeroth-expansion-generic-banner.png
---
#### Signup Thread https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-starting/
#### Players Backups + Spectators will be updated on the signup thread.
1. ~~Alice~~ -> an_gorta_pratai - Killed N6 - [color=red]Goblin[/color] Hunter 2. ModeShifter - Executed D2 - [color=steblue]Night Elf[/color] Rogue 3. SirDerpsAlot - Executed D3 - [color=red]Troll[/color] Priest 4. chloe 5. Blizer 6. Apprentice - Executed D1 - [color=red]Troll[/color] Death Knight 7. oB_L1ght - Modkilled D2 - [color=red]Blood Elf[/color] Priest 8. ~~Leafia~~ Executed D4 - [color=red]Goblin[/color] Rogue 9. Frankie - Killed N2 - [color=red]Undead[/color] Hunter 10. ~~Ami~~ -> Vulgard - Killed N2 - [Flipless] [color=red]Orc[/color] Warrior 11. ~~Centuries~~ - Killed N6 - [color=red]Orc[/color] Mage 12. Italy 13. ~~CRichard564~~ -> PokemonKidRyan - Executed D5 - [color=red]Goblin[/color] Death Knight 14. ~~Chuck~~ -> Moleland - Killed N7 - [color=red]Orc[/color] Monk 15. Napoleon -> muki - Executed D7 - [color=steblue]Draenei[/color] Priest 16. ~~10_posts_daily~~ -> eevee - Killed N5 - [Flipless]
#### Moments of Significance
* [First Execution](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-2-15-16/82340/2157?u=kyodaz) - Apprentice * [First Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-2-15-16/82340/2165?u=kyodaz) - Nobody * [Second Execution](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-3-11-16/82340/3556?u=kyodaz) - ModeShifter * [Second Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-3-11-16/82340/3561?u=kyodaz) - Vulgard, Frankie * [Third Execution](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-voting-thread/82482/3?u=kyodaz) - SirDerpsAlot * [Third Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-4-10-16/82340/4493?u=kyodaz) - Nobody * [Fourth Execution](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-voting-thread/82482/45?u=kyodaz) - Leafia * [Fourth Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-night-5-8-16/82340/5745?u=kyodaz) - Nobody * [Fifth Execution](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-voting-thread/82482/63?u=kyodaz) - PokemonKidRyan * [Fifth Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-7-5-16/82340/6494?u=kyodaz) - eevee * [Sixth Execution (?)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-voting-thread/82482/72?u=kyodaz) - [color=gold]Lady Gaga[/color] * [Sixth Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-7-5-16/82340/6701?u=kyodaz) - an_gorta_pratai, Centuries * [Seventh Execution](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-voting-thread/82482/79?u=kyodaz) - muki * [Seventh Night End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-day-8-3-16/82340/6871?u=kyodaz) - Moleland

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: Napoleon
item.description:
But it doesn’t really work though…

You can tell if an alt is an experienced player or a newbie pretty early on.

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
Based on the new program and the rarity of true newbies here (at least as of late)
like i dont think it’s possible to not subconsciously initially interpret a new account to be an alt in most cases.

Read full topic

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: DatBird
item.description:
The point of alts is to hopefully make it seem like a newby signing up for the first time. Thus theres a disillusion of wether said player be an alt or newbie

Read full topic

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I was bearing your reads in mind, but I was 50/50 on whether the slanker was scum or the suspicious person was scum.

With no meta to reference, I made the wrong choice

Read full topic

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
Nah, they weren’t, but I scumread the wolf who got yeeted d2, hardpushed the second, and voted the third at EoD. I only miscleared Leafia, who had no TMI. I did misclear her, though.

At any rate, they were good enough to get me nightkilled immediately. Which is why I’m really sad about so many people backreading me without noticing that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Tbf, your reads weren’t perfect.

Read full topic

/jettison Chloe

Goblin spaceship to the rescue, saving town from clearing a WOLF WOLF WOLF.

That aged very poorly.

item.description:

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
Chloe finding the poem was clearly fake (or shouldn’t give her towncred at the very least) as she had unvoted, basically giving up if scum, and conveniently found it like 5 minutes later

I was writing a post pointing this out when leafia just went ahead and selfhammered

still mad @ that

Read full topic

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)

item.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Alliance Victory (2/16)
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
Moleland:

You never explicitly said not to trust Chloe tbf

I told you through whisper I’m not trusting them?
I was saying in thread since day 1 I think hey are evil?
I even said that I don’t believe them “finding” the poem?

Like… how much more do you need me to say that?

Read full topic
